items.content: <speak>Hi! <amazon:emotion name= 'disappointed' intensity= 'medium'> I can tell you where to report your scam. This is the USA dot gov scams wizard. </amazon:emotion> No need to tell me any personal information. Say which of the following applies: fake or scam check, mortgage or foreclosure, phishing, unauthorized withdrawal, or say 'something else' for other <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='faɪnæncəl'> financial</phoneme> scams.</speak>
